name: GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum for Severe Signs of Thinning
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is: A dermatologist co-developed hair serum that visibly improves hair density, addresses shedding, and hydrates the scalp to support the skin barrier...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Thinning.- Flaky, Dry Scalp..Key Benefits: - Visibly improves hair density.- Promotes a balanced scalp.- Strengthens from the root..Highlighted Ingredients:- GROActive+ Complex™: A patent-pending, AI-discovered, plant-based compound to address shedding..- Spanish Microalgae: A prebiotic scalp superfood that hydrates to support the skin barrier..- Plant Stem Cells: Rich in proteins to anchor strands at the root...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated for those with severe shedding, this hair serum is powered by Vegamour’s patent-pending GROActive+ Complex™, an innovation that is helping to redefine what a plant-based formula can achieve. The compound features an AI-selected blend of antioxidant-rich Rhapontic Rhubarb Root and Japanese BeautyBerry Extract that work synergistically to visibly improve hair density. It's also formulated with Spanish microalgae, a prebiotic superfood that hydrates to rebalance the scalp environment, and plant stem cells which anchor hair follicles from the root...Fragrance Description: This product is formulated without fragrance..Clinical Results: In a 120-day clinical study of 40 participants using GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum once daily:.- 93% had a clinically measured increase in hair density.- Results showed an up to 87% reduction in hair loss due to breakage from washing and combing..In a 120-day consumer study of 40 participants using GRO+ Advanced Serum once daily:.- 98% saw less shedding..Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -GROActive+ Complex™: A patent-pending, AI-discovered, plant-based compound to address shedding. .-Spanish Microalgae: A prebiotic scalp superfood that hydrates to support the skin barrier. .-Plant Stem Cells: Rich in proteins to anchor strands at the root. ..Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., Propanediol, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, (Trifolium Pratense (Clover)/Vigna Radiata) Sprout Extract, Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1, Rheum Rhaponticum Root Extract, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Callicarpa Japonica Fruit Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Caffeine, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Lecithin, Sodium Phytate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Alcohol, Cyclodextrin, Citric Acid, Phytic Acid, Lactic Acid, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Xanthan Gum...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a dropperful to scalp daily. .-Massage in. .-Use on wet or dry hair. .-Do not rinse. .-For best results, use after Vegamour’s GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I applied this hair serum daily on dry hair or after shower.  I like that its easy to apply, and it feels lightweight and non sticky. It helped my scalp to be more little healthy and I did felt that my hair grew.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had significant weight loss and have tried almost everything. This is the only product that has decreased my shedding. It’s only been a little over a week and I see a difference. I can’t wait to see the hair growth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for over a month, I see no difference. My hair is still fall out at a crazy rate. I do not experience great stress, I have not changed my diet, and I use the same shampoo, conditioner, and stylers.  Also, one vile is not enough to last for a month. It is nearly impossible to cover the full scalp with one pipette.

reviews.review_title: Won’t go without on my hair journey
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using Vegamour’s Gro+ Advanced Hair Serum, and I’m seriously impressed. It’s super easy to work into my routine – just a few drops, and I’m done. I love that it feels lightweight and doesn’t leave any greasy residue; my hair feels natural, not weighed down at all. Best part? I’m already noticing way less shedding, which feels like such a win. My hair stylist is also seeing a lot of new growth when I go in for my extension moveups!! Highly recommend for anyone looking for an effortless boost in their hair care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really fine hair as it is and as I get older, I feel like it gets finer. This serum has filled in some of my thinner areas and make my hair feel and look so much healthier. Consistency really is key

reviews.review_title: Expensive and small amount of product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for CA$120 and used it daily as advised, and not even 2 and a half weeks later I’ve run out. Obviously it’s too early to see results, so I’m expected to buy a new bottle every 3ish weeks? I like to splurge, but no. This would total over 2000 annually. I think there’s definitely better alternatives especially considering it’s dubious if this even works at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m really upset. The previous formula with CBD helped my hairline to grow in over the past year after having COVID and hormonal issues. It helped to cure my itchy scalp. This product has made my scalp itchy. Every day I see little hair falling out in the sink! This didn’t happen before using it. It’s made my hair greasy. The price has drastically gone up. They ruined the formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has definitely helped my hair to more healthy and also grow. I used this serum for 3 months and improved my hair fall. Serum does not make my hair feel sticky at all. I would highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is highlighted, thin and curly. This rurned me into a poodle instantly. I tried to just keep it at the root and it still spreads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has helped me so much with growing my hair, that I couldn’t believe this worked so well and confirmed it after seeing my before and after pictures! This is incredible and I didn’t even use it every single day. This is just incredible. Doesn’t make my hair any oilier and it’s a super lightweight serum, it’s like water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Giving this product 4 stars because I do feel that it helped my hair grow and I love the convenience of being able to apply it on wet or dry hair. The product is easy to apply and the packaging is luxurious. It has a light scent and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin and scalp. Month one I didn’t see much difference to my hair, month two I felt that my hair was growing faster and longer in a shorter amount of time. Month 3 I saw length progress as well. Unfortunately I didn’t notice a difference in the density of my hair, I felt like there were still sparse areas lacking in hair. I also noticed by month three I had many shorter hairs, whether that was hair growth or breakage was hard to decifer. I have very fine oily hair so it’s quite noticeable. I do love that this product is fair trade, cruelty free, and plant based. See pictures for results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really really wanted to have positive things to say about this product. However, I made the changes to my current everything using the same shampoo and conditioner like the full 90 days I made me change to my medication however, I was surprised by the amount of hair loss I had when I started my hair was down past my butt, but I used more I was losing hair at the roots. I also found that my scalp was extremely itchy and started to scab over as well as burning. The only thing I changed to my hair resume but using this product and I feel this product is to blame for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Skeepers and Vegamour in exchange for my honest review. I received the NEW! GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum by Vegamour.  This product is supposed to help promote hair growth. I have been having an issue with losing a lot of hair lately, so I was excited to try out this product.  I think I will have to use this product longer to see if it really helps with regrowing my hair. This product did not cause any allergic reaction or itching. The consistency of the product was good. The three things I didn’t like about it was the dropper did not fill up completely, it only filled up half way. The product never really seemed to cover all of my scalp. Also, it made my hair feel greasy.  Overall, it was an ok product but it does have some issues. I would like to see how my hair growth improves in the next year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great hair serum! I love that it can be used on wet or dry hair. I was worried that if I used it on dry hair that my hair would look greasy afterwards but it did not. I started noticing some improvement where my hair had some bald spots after a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: definitely saw a difference in my hair, although with my busy schedule it was hard to remember to put it on my scalp each day. also very easy to use and definitely did not make my hair oily which was scared of!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine, thin, dry, damaged hair. The texture is straight and I don’t color my hair.  I was using this serum for 3 months - total of 3 bottles used. I could see my hair being visibly shinier and healthier looking.  I usually had to wash my hair every other day because my scalp got oily very quickly.  While using this serum I realized I could go 3-4 days without washing my hair. I think overall the health of my hair definitely improved. If you have funds to spend I would definitely try this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ve been using the GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum for a few months now, and I am blown away by the results. As someone who has struggled with severe shedding and thinning hair, this serum has been a game-changer for me.  From the start, I was impressed by the fact that this serum is dermatologist co-developed and clinically proven. Knowing that it was specifically formulated to improve hair density and reduce hair loss gave me the confidence to give it a try, and I'm so glad I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When using the product, my hair gets a little damp but dries quickly. The hair loss has stopped and new hair is growing. My scalp is no longer irritated as much, so the product worked perfectly well and met expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super happy that I was able to try this product out. This hair serum, is pretty good. I’ve been using in my night routine. I have noticed quite a difference. Really love and will continue to use in my night routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Been using it for months! It’s part of my routine. My hair feels stronger and the breakage is also less. The growth takes time but it does happen! Plus the bottle itself is so cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been consistent with this product for about 3 months now and I can absolutely see results! I used it daily and I really enjoy that the product does not make my hair look greasy! I have fine hair that looks oily within a day of showering, so to me it was really important that the product did not force me to have a slick ponytail everyday! reviews.review_title: Solved all my hair thinning problems!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a young single mother suffering from postpartum hair loss and fragile hair to begin with… this product has really changed the game for me. I have always had very fine curly hair but since having my son (he’s now 5) my hair has begun to suffer, I’ve hard bald spots from clip in extensions and what looks like a receding hair line and now since using this product for 90 days, I have about 2 inches worth of hair growth all around my head. It’s to the point where I cannot currently wear my hair up because I have these curly thick ringlets of new growth sprouting everywhere! This stuff is the real deal. It’s unscented, doesn’t make your hair greasy so it’s safe and reccomended to be used morning and night, and the results were so fast I was blown away!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After giving birth my hair was thinning and basically falling out to the point that I had several balding spots. Being able to try this serum and to see results was a blessing! It was super easy to use and left no greasy feeling after application. My hair is fuller and I feel so much better about myself. I can now style it how I would like without feeling embarrassed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve really been enjoying this so far! I definitely have noticed some baby hairs coming in. I also really like how it’s water based so it doesn’t leave my hair oily at all! I’m going to continue using it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have tried this item for 3 months now consistently. I have noticed my hair having a shine to it, have not seen much growth as of yet. Have gotten another 3 months supply which is when I expect to see more growth. Would recommend if you are in your hair journey to have quality hair, cannot quite attest to hair growth yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum is an absolute game changer! I immediately noticed a difference in my hair density, hydration, and the reduction of shedding. I have had less hair loss and absolutely love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down my FAVORITE hair serum! First of all it can be used on wet or dry hair and is NOT greasy!! As someone with fine hair, serums with oil leave my hair looking dirty and stringy, but this Gro+ advanced serum has never made my hair look that way! I also experienced postpartum hair loss along my hairline and I can confidently say, this serum has helped my hairline fill in tremendously! I highly recommend it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum really helped my hair feel healthier. It is a watery, non greasy serum. You use a dropped to apply it to your scalp. It doesn’t matter if your hair is wet or dry. It has no significant smell and I can’t tell I used it after applying. After using for a few weeks my hair feels fuller and thicker at the scalp. My scalp feels more hydrated and I’m not shedding as much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum for a little over a month, and the results have been nothing short of amazing. I was skeptical at first, but this serum has completely exceeded my expectations. My hair feels thicker, healthier, and I’m noticing new growth in areas that were thinning before. The serum is lightweight, non-greasy, and doesn’t leave any residue, which is a huge plus for me. I also love that it’s infused with CBD, which has really helped calm any irritation on my scalp. The application process is simple, and I’ve incorporated it into my nightly routine without any hassle. It has a light, pleasant scent that isn’t overpowering. I’ve tried so many products in the past, but none have delivered the results that Vegamour has. I can’t recommend this product enough to anyone struggling with thinning hair or looking to improve their overall hair health. It’s worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been having so many changes over the time I have been using this product, in fact, I have my hair way shorter than I used to have it (I just changed my style), but I can say my hair got to be really long thanks to this product! It works amazing and it’s super easy to apply. I didn’t develop any allergy reaction and it was a nice way to help me with the fact that I lose too much hair constantly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This hair serum was a gift from Vegamour and I am happy to use it. It is a product that took me time to apply every day because I always forgot, but after seeing that my hair was growing little by little and that my roots were getting stronger, I gave myself the opportunity and the commitment to use it daily. It is a procured product that met my expectations and that made a change before and after in my hair. It is easy to use, leaves no residue, has no smell, is practical and best of all, it works excellently. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair serum is EVERYTHING! I have been consistently using this for three months now and have noticed such an improvement in the thickness and growth of my hair. I was struggling with hair thinning and had to cut my hair short. This serum has been my saving grace and bought my hair back to life

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product! A natural way to grow your hair and doesn’t leave it oily or heavy. Definitely recommend. I used this every day for three months and have noticed a drastic difference in the density of my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this Gro+ advanced hair serum consistently for the last 3 months and here’s what I’ve noticed: Lots of new little baby hairs growing in! When I wash my hair, I’m only losing 2-3 strands of hair now. I was losing substantially more prior to using this serum. My hair also seems to be growing faster in length overall. I have thin hair, and it tends to look oily very easily from using hair products. This leaves zero oily residue, so I didn’t have to wash my hair more often. I’m seriously impressed. Don’t wait on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always wanted to try VEGAMOUR and after having a bad experience with another monthly hair care product- I was hesitant. Now, I wish I had started vegamour months, even years ago! I have seen so much growth in the areas where I apply the serum to my scalp and am loving the results and will be continuing to use! It’s also super thin and absorbs well without leaving any residue or being flaky/thick, etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum work really well. I currently use their regrowth serum and it works wonders so I am confident this will work my hair too. I can't wait to see the results with this one . I like the packaging of this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this oil so much and can I just say how beautiful the packaging is. It scratched an itch I didn’t know needed to be scratched. I have super dry skin and very eczema prone so I’ve severely prioritized my scalp health this year. I was excited to try this product because I have dry, curly hair and have noticed an increased amount of shedding. This oil has become a staple in my nightly routine. After consistent use, I’ve started to noticed baby hair popping through. I’m so excited what my density will look like as I continue to use this oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so luxurious. I don’t have the final results as I’ve only been using it for weeks, but is refreshing and I swear I’m already seeing less shedding. I battle genetic and age related hair loss and I’m really happy with this product so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t had it long enough to see any noticeable results, but I do love how lightweight it is. As expected, I have fine/thin hair & try to only wash a couple times a week, so I NEED a serum that doesn’t leave ANY oily residue & this delivers that. It’s practically water. It is high in alcohol tho, which is my only complaint, but I haven’t noticed any dryness, yet, as a side effect. You can smell the alcohol for a couple seconds, but it dissipates immediately. Other than that, fairly odorless. Love the glass bottle & clean ingredients! I’m really looking forward to finishing the 3 month campaign to have a chance to actually see the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got pregnant six months after my second child was born, and have 3 babies under 4 years old so I feel like my hair has been falling out for the last four years. It’s especially noticeable around the temple area since using this serum the areas look a lot fuller and there is visible growth. I can’t wait to see my hair grow back fully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This grow plus hair serum is really nice. Its thin and absorbs into the scalp really effortlessly without leaving any sort of residue or weighing down the hair. I look forward to seeing results but after only a week I haven’t noticed much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this everyday because my hair is typically thin and has been getting more hair loss than usual. This serum is a must have for me! I noticed before that I'm shedding so much after I wake up and after shower. Thanks to this hair serum I haven't seen that much shedding since then.

reviews.review_title: Best thing to happen to my hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Gro+ Advanced serum has been a game changer for my hair density. My hair fall situation improved so quickly and I noticed how my hair started to feel thicker and had more volume to it. I'll never stop using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have not been using long enough to see results, but let me point out a few differences from the regular serum (not Advanced): this version is more milky and seems thicker, yet dries faster. If my hair is half dry it will leave a slight oily residue but not as badly as the original version, this one seems more user friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Previously I used the original hair serum and it worked really well, so I was very excited to try this new advanced version. The formula is a bit thicker than the original but absorbs just as easily. This time around I’ve also been using it in tandem with the dermaroller for about a week. It’s still early days, but I look forward to seeing long-term results after further use. Love Vegamour products though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum for a few weeks, and the results are incredible! My hair feels thicker, and I’ve noticed significantly less shedding. It’s easy to apply, absorbs quickly without any greasiness, and works great on my fine, wavy hair. Plus, I love that it's vegan and fragrance-free. Definitely a game-changer for anyone dealing with thinning hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamour made this so simple to use especially with the easy to pick up vial/drop , love that this is unscented.  and won’t make hair oily. I’ve done the formula in pink bottle & did the 3 months worth supply so Its harder to tell in a shorter time span. Would need more days & probably 2 more bottles to see how different they compare. I see less shedding, in both brushing my hair & shower time, I use to see clumps in my hands but this does help with that& now I see less fall out especially all over the house, floor, sinks, bathtub.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum works well specially paired with the dermaroller for better absorption! Where I have noticed the biggest change is on my hairline. I can see baby hairs growing! That's where I focus the most in applying the serum. My hair hasn't stopped falling fully but the amount has diminished and I can see growth which is awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so impressed with this hair serum, it has made such a huge difference in how my hair grows. I feel like it is much fuller since starting this serum and I have had many compliment on the new baby hair growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the serum after I wash my hair. It doesn’t feel sticky or greasy and it absorbs quickly. Doesn’t leave any scent on my hair. My scalp was not irritated or oily after use. I still need to use it over a period of time to see more results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I apply a full dropper to my scalp every day and massage it in with a roller. I prefer using it on dry hair. This scent-free, water-based product absorbs quickly without any stickiness. My hair feels refreshed and not oily at all. It's incredibly easy to use and feels amazing. After just two weeks, I've noticed a visible difference in my hair's fullness and overall health.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Vegamour, and I've tried their original GRO serum in the past and had success, so it was definitely exciting to try this new Advanced formula. It's great that you can use it literally anytime you'd like to without needing to worry about having greasy or weighed down hair. Just one dropper full of the serum (it even less), and your good to go. It's a fantastic serum, and I cannot wait to see my results! 😍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The whole Vegamour line is stellar. I have super fine hair so so many oils and serums weigh my hair down and make me not want to use them, but I don’t have that issue here - these don’t feel greasy and don’t build up on my scalp!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to try this because I have super fine hair that is REALLY greasy, but to my surprise there was zero residue and it didn’t leave my hair greasy at all. It’s super like and seems to disappear as you massage it in.

reviews.review_title: I upgraded from the original GRO Serum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I need to know how Vegamour effortlessly created the best hair growth serums. After going through countless bottles of the regular GRO serum, imagine my excitement when I finally got my hands on the GRO+! One thing I noticed is that GRO+ has a more subtle scent compared to the original (I loved the original's fragrance, don’t get me wrong, but GRO+ has a more feminine touch if that matters to you). The GRO+ formula is just as effective—it doesn't weigh your hair down and applies like water. I focus it on my thinning areas, specifically my front bangs and the top of my scalp. For best results, I apply it to air-dried hair at night. I've only been using it for a few weeks, so I haven’t seen significant baby hairs yet, but I'm enjoying it as much as the original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Vegamour Gro + Advanced Hair Serum for just under two weeks.  Unfortunately I have yet to see any real results as of yet, though I feel that it’s too soon.  Consistently is key with hair growth serums so I will continue to use the remainder of the bottle in the hopes I will start seeing results soon!  The product is packaged perfectly, especially since it contains an eye dropper.  Using the eye dropper you can easily apply to problem areas.  I truly feel this product will produce results if used daily for the full month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum so much. Vegamour is the only brand where I have seen some improvement in hair growth. I see baby hairs and my hair feels much thicker. I use one dropper full once and day and it does the trick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a mom, I have been dealing with thinning hair for quite awhile. I am very picky with hair products that I used, especially hair serums. I have just started using this product recently along with the shampoo & conditioner and so far I am loving it! I love the fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula & it feels lightweight on the hair. I will have to give an update after using this for a month or two. But for now, definitely worth checking out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the New GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum from Vegamour for about 3 months already and I’ve noticed that the hair shedding has reduced significantly. As you can see from my before and after photos, the amount of shedding was on a fast track. 3 months into this treatment and the shedding has stopped. Additionally, the serum is unscented, so it won’t clash with any other hair products or leave any unpleasant odors in your hair. This is a significant improvement, and I'm thrilled with the results. I've also been using the matching conditioner and shampoo, which I believe has contributed to these early signs of new hair growth. However, the serum itself is undoubtedly effective, as evidenced by the baby hairs I've noticed.  For those looking to accelerate results, using a derma roller on the scalp in conjunction with this serum can make a noticeable difference. This is likely why I'm seeing new growth so quickly. Additionally, incorporating a red therapy brush into my routine has also been beneficial.  One of the standout features of this serum is its lightweight nature. Unlike another hair serum I previously used, which left my scalp greasy and forced me to wash my hair more frequently, this serum leaves my hair and scalp feeling fresh and clean.   I highly recommend the Grow Plus Advanced Hair Serum if you're looking to promote hair growth. As someone who is 10 months postpartum and still experiencing hair loss, this serum has been a game-changer in helping to restore some of the hair I've lost. Overall, I would give this product a glowing 5-star rating.

reviews.review_text: **Ease of Use:** 5/5  The Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum comes in a sleek dropper bottle. The serum is a lightweight liquid that is easy to dispense and apply. I simply massaged a few drops into my scalp each night, as directed.  **Feel:** 5/5  The serum feels refreshing on the scalp. It has a light, pleasant scent that dissipates quickly. I didn't experience any irritation or discomfort while using it.  **Results:** 4/5  I started using the Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum in hopes of reducing hair loss and promoting hair growth. After about 6 weeks of consistent use, I began to notice a decrease in hair shedding and an increase in the thickness and fullness of my hair. I also noticed that my hair was growing faster than usual.  The results were gradual but noticeable. While I didn't experience a dramatic regrowth of lost hair, I was pleased with the overall improvement in my hair's health and appearance.  **Additional Observations:**  * The serum is vegan, cruelty-free, and free from sulfates, parabens, and dyes. * It contains a blend of clinically proven ingredients, including mung bean extract, red clover extract, and biotin. * The bottle contains 30 mL of serum, which lasted me for about 3 months with regular use.  **Conclusion:**  The Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum is an easy-to-use and effective hair growth serum. It has helped to reduce hair loss, improve hair thickness and fullness, and promote faster hair growth. While it may not be a miracle cure for hair loss, it is a promising option for anyone looking to improve the health and appearance of their hair.

reviews.review_text: **Title: Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum Review: A Game-Changer for Severe Thinning**  Are you struggling with severe hair thinning and desperate for a solution that actually works? Look no further than the Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum. As someone who has battled thinning hair for years, I can confidently say this product is a game-changer.  From the moment I started using Vegamour GRO+, I noticed a significant reduction in hair shedding within just a few weeks. The serum's blend of clinically proven ingredients like Red Clover Extract and mung bean helps nourish and strengthen hair follicles, promoting healthier, thicker hair growth.  What impressed me most was the serum's lightweight texture and non-greasy formula, making it easy to incorporate into my daily routine without any hassle. Unlike other products I've tried, Vegamour GRO+ didn't weigh down my hair or leave any residue, which is crucial for someone with fine hair like mine.  After using it consistently for two months, I saw a noticeable improvement in the volume and thickness of my hair. My scalp felt healthier, and I even noticed new growth in areas where my hair had been thinning the most. It's truly been a confidence booster to see my hair looking fuller and more vibrant.  If you're hesitant about trying yet another hair product, I understand. I've been there. But let me assure you, Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum is worth every penny. It's not just another promise; it's a solution backed by science and real results. Give it a try, and like me, you might just find yourself amazed at what your hair can become.
